enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: The draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/CRP.2): welcome the progress made by the IPCC in the development of LULUCF good practice guidance and highlight the importance of timely completion of this work by COP-9; and encourage the IPCC to continue its work with the FAO, and take into consideration input from this process when developing definitions for forest degradation and devegetation of other vegetation types.
